title: Google L3 Offer Accepted [Hyderabad]
content:
Education: B.tech in CSE (Tier2)
Years of Experience: 2.5
Prior Experience: Startup
Date of the Offer: 17 Dec 2024
Company: Google
Title/Level: Software Engineer
Location: Hyderabad
Salary:21,90,000 INR + 147,168 INR(retirals)
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 259,000
Stock bonus: 54000 USD
Bonus: 328,500 (15% of the base)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 46,48,000 INR
Benefits: Food + gym + Free home pickup and drop service + other standard benefits
Other details:
Current CTC :- 25 LPA

title: JP Morgan || SDE-3 || Offer Evaluation || Current Walmart
content:
Education: B. Tech from tier III
Years of Experience: 3 year 10 months
Prior Experience: 2 years at Service based MNC(3.6 LPA) + ~2 years at PBC
Current Salary : 22 fixed + 4.2 Bonus + 5.3 RSU (vested equally over 3 years)
Date of the Offer: Dec 2024
Company: JP Morgan Chase
Title/Level: SDE - 3
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 37L INR including PF & Gratuity 
Signing Bonus: 4L in first month salary
Stock bonus: NA
Bonus: Standard performance bonus 12% of salary every year ~ 4.2 LPA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + JB): ~43.2L for first year
Benefits: Standard JPMC Benefits


Intial offer was 34L base and no joining bonus. After negotiation 4L bonus got added and base increased to 37L.

Another offer : https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/6133916/cisco-g8-blr-40-lpa-need-suggestion/2758665


Is there any further increase in base possible after negotiation? What's the salary range for SDE-3 at JPMC?

I'll add interview experience soon.
